item.title: Netflix Drama ’27 Nights,’ Polish Neo-Noir ‘Winter of the Crow’ to Open, Close San Sebastian
item.description: Netflix Argentinian family drama “27 Nights,” directed by Daniel Hendler (“Norberto’s Deadline,” “The Candidate”) will open the San Sebastián Film Festival on Sept. 19, playing in competition. The ope

item.title: Laura Baumeister Directed ‘What Follows Is My Death’ Casts Ludwika Paleta and Wendy Chinchilla, Lines up New Co-Production Partners (EXCLUSIVE)

item.title: Bendita Film Sales Boards ‘Dance of the Living,’ José Alayón’s San Sebastián New Directors World Premiere (EXCLUSIVE)
